coreAttributes.name: Canine Crunch
coreAttributes.description: An individually-wrapped cookie baked in the shape of a bone. It's covered in icing and sprinkles, and while the packaging declares that the recipe has been specially formulated for dog-morphs, it's completely edible for all races.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel a lot more energetic...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 2)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(peel)] back the packaging and [npc.verb(pop)] the Canine Crunch into [npc.her] mouth. Quickly chewing and swallowing the icing-topped cookie, [npc.sheIs] happy to discover that it's absolutely delicious.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(peel)] back the paper packaging and [npc.verb(pop)] the Canine Crunch into [npc2.namePos] mouth. Quickly chewing and swallowing the icing-topped cookie, [npc2.sheIs] happy to discover that it's absolutely delicious.
